attributes.action: ASK JOHN LEESON IF HE COULD POSSIBLY COME TO WORK FOR MORE THAN FOUR CONSECUTIVE WEEKS WITHOUT HAVING A HOLIDAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT HAS BEEN NOTED THAT MR LESSON HAS A PHOBIA OF WORKING MORE THAN FOUR WEEKS ON THE TROTT, WITHOUT HAVING A BREAK

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
